message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it's quite valuable and fairly priced at that amount. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $150 is my bottom line. I'm confident it's a fair price considering its value. I'm willing to part with it for $150, but I can't go any lower.
